Game is literally unplayable right now for survivors. I can just dont play new content if new content is not fun and I can dodge it. But right now I can't dodge this shit patch, they force me to use their cancer UI design and animation design. So I guess they just want me to not play their game.

-- 2021-02-09 update

This game has really bad rank system that make game not friendly to new player. If you are new player and only play solo survivor, not touch this game.

Devs didn't give the difference between solo survivor and swf (survivor with friends). Solo survivor (hard mode) and swf (easy mode) are totally different game. When survivor with firends, they dont need perk to get killer's information and teammates' information and they can get more details by communications.

For solo survivor, most of killer players play like against swf that they just camping and tunneling and no teammate even can help you. What you can get in that game depends on killer. So just hope you can get a good killer.

For killer, you cant tell which is or solo survivors. I play lots of solo survivor games, so I will try to play nicely as killer, but these swfs will totally reckt me. But most of time I get lots of solo players, which is fun to play against.

Over all, playing as killer is more easier than playing as solo survivor. So if you play as survivor with your friend or play as killer, have fun in this game. Or dont touch this game!

This game i enjoyed this game alot when i first started to play it.
But the devs clearly see not signs of wishing to make this game fun an interesting for Killers.
With continuous nerfs to either the killers themselves or to basic game mechanics which nerfs all killers in general, they seem to only want to appease the survivors as they are 4 of the 5 players in every game.

If you only want to play this game as a survivor then you will enjoy this game, if you want to play both sides of this game then don't buy it as you will find nothing but stress and frustration coming out of the killers side of the game. and the devs has made it clear they have not intention on changing that by their repeated comments about the issue simply being play survivor in that case.

Just for fun and learning.

This game is cool with friends, but once you get red rank, shit just get serious.
Anyways: toxic community/survivors/killers, Memes, good ambient, Good/Bad Perfomance, bugs, but still playable most of the times.

Plays survivor- gets killers that camp/tunnel and teamates that dont know their left from their right.
Plays killer- gets the worst map for that killer EVERY SINGLE TIME and a Survive With Friends with flashlights, pallet looping, Desicive Strike and who Teabag at every chance they get.

Do not buy this game, you will hate yourself for it.
this game is so skinny

Ich wollte jetzt nach einigen Stunden Spielzeit meine Review dazu verfassen. Zuerst einmal ist das Spielerlebniss ein sehr gruseliges das mit vielen Faktoren verknüpft ist. Ich selber war am Anfang sehr geflasht von diesem Game der Grund dafür ist folgender: Die Umsetzung von Killer Vs. Überlebende ist eine sehr simple Aufgabe aber schwierig umzusetzen aus der Sicht des Killers wie auch des Überlebenden. Der Überlebende hat Aufgaben die nicht unbedingt leicht zu gestalten sind unteranderm auch auch weil die Aufgaben darin bestehen Motoren mit dazugehörigen Fähigkeitschecks zu meistern sind die am Anfang sehr schwierig erscheinen. Rund um ein simple aufgebautes Spiel das sich aber als etwas schwieriger heraustellt. 

Eine Erweiterung würde mir gefallen undzwar ein Modus in dem es zwei Killer gibt und doppelt soviele Überlebende als mit einem Killer. Mit doppelt so großen Maps und doppelt so viele Generatoren. Das würde nochmal einen schönen Spielerlebnisskick geben der mir persönlich und Freunden von mir sehr gefallen würde. Ich hoffe das sowas in der Art bald in Angriff genommen wird. 

Im Großen und Ganzen ist das Spiel sehr empfehlenswert.
cum
Its just amazing would definetly recommend it if you like horror+multiplayer love it <3

Update 3/18/21

Takes over 10m - 15m to get into a match, where there is a 95% chance you will get tunneled/camped by players in both high and low ranks in order for them to belittle you in chat about how "bad" you played and brag about their ranking - I say both high and low ranks bc ranking is a non factor in this game, its just there for looks - just look at the dull colors and feel proud of your achievement to nothing.

Many homophobic & racist remarks in post/endgame chat on both sides with no consequences - Devs do little to nothing to resolve this. I have an entire folder dedicated to how many times I have been called the LGBTQ+ F slur, last updated 1 day ago.

When playing as survivor, be aware that your teammates are much worse than the killer. 

There are many streamers saying the DBD Community is not the most toxic community out there bc there are other games that have worse communities. This statement literally is brushing off all of the issues plaguing the game. 

This game may not have THE most toxic community, but it is up there with the rest of the ones those streamers like to point out.

Don't let the streamer hype fool you, this game has not gotten better, the devs do not care about anyone's input, so any issues people are complaining about - believe them, because its been the same for almost 5yrs with no foreseeable change.

Update 11/13/20

Due to current state of the game, I do not recommend this game for new players. 

There are tons of glitches and issues that the developers are refusing to fix at this point - Hitboxes & Matchmaking being the most important - now you know why it goes on sale a lot 

When asked via their support, you will always get the same generic response: "Our team is working hard to get these issues worked out"....Their team has been "working hard" for 4yrs with no change, the "team" has fallen asleep at the wheel.

Maybe my feelings will change if these issues are fixed, but it's been 4yrs - I won't hold my breath waiting for assistance, they have more important things to deal with, like finding another killer/survivor/cosmetics to add in game to cover up their lack of attention to the things that need fixing. 

Another generic response you will get when asking "why there are no fixes but more and more cosmetics/DLCs being released": "Different Department" - when you ask what department deals with the issues, no one responds or you get the same answer I stated above - aka a company that does not communicate with each other or does not care.

Let me be clear about something, I love this game, to the point that I probably play it more than I should - but just because you love something does not mean it is free of criticism. It's why I chose to edit this review. The game is in the worst state it has been in a long time.

You would hope a company that claims to love its community so much would treat them better by listening/fixing the issues plaguing the game rather than worry about cosmetics and adding more things that they are just going to have to fix later on. Sadly, they have proven they do not care about the issues, its all about $. 

I hope I can edit this review again with more positive news later on, but for now, it is what it is.
кайф

The game itself is pretty good, but the problem that should be solved, in addition to the animations that are bugged from time to time, is the multiplayer system. I do not understand why I can not win blood with friends, or not being able to play online with a friend, being one a murderer and another survivor. In the Hearthstone the gold gain system with friends is pretty good and I do not understand why you can not replicate with this game. You should also be able to buy the murderers and survivors with blood, as has the Rainbows Six Siege system, that your players' cup has increased for that reason. I give the game a 6/10 because it has many things to solve being that they have been with the game for 2 years. I hope the developers someday listen to the community or finally listen to my message to have a better game.

Avoid like the f*****g plague. Turned into the most boring game in the world.

As a survivor, you will enjoy it if 
1 - You dont want a challenge
2 - You like waiting in a lobby for 15 minutes for a game that lasts 4 minutes. 
3 - You want to be bored to death

As a killer you will enjoy it if
1 - You want to be bored to death
2 - You enjoy seeing gens get done before you can even get over to the side of the map to reach them
3 - You enjoy paying for the game and the dlc and playing a game for 4 minutes and realising how survivor sided this is.

This is honestly a really fun game. Aside from toxity in the community it's a really fun game with friends. And it's been a god send through one of the toughest times in my life. Some of the perks can be broken the game has isssues with lobbies and it can be rage inducing if you find yourself the type to get angry easily. Overall it's worth the price

Okay, this is a bit of a tricky one to write. This game is, or well, can be good. A majority of the game is exceptionally buggy and rough around the edges, but not too bad. Sometimes this game can in fact be unplayable do to being placed in matches with killers that have to infinty and beyond ping, but overall, not too bad. Some of the killers are definitely better than others so there could be a pay to win element in this game but it can be looked at in both ways. There is defnitely some latency issues when traversing over obstacles to get away from killers, but if you can play this game with a friend, I would highly recommend this as I've gotten some pretty good laughs. However, if you are playing alone then it can be a pretty bad game at times, depending solely on your teammates and the killer.

УЖАС во всех смыслах. После покупки столкнулся с ошибками, которые просто в ряд выстроились чтобы ты попытался их решить. Ошибка соеднение с сервером, десятки раз выскакивает не давая даже зайти в меню. В конце концов после пяти перезаходов я зашел в меню. После первой игры за выжившего пишет "ОШИБКА СОХРАНЕНИЯ" и ни тебе ни опыта не очков крови (местная валюта). Подумал ладно, выкинуло в стартовую страницу где опять ошибка с соединением не дает поиграть. Третья ошибка как раз чтобы добить тебя - "КЛИЕНТ ЕАС НЕ МОЖЕТ БЫТЬ ИНСТАНЦИРОВАН", и у тебя остается нажать только "выйти из игры". Все, игра для меня закончилась. Читаю пол дня форумы, все бестолковые, без ответов. Просто люди столкнулись с этой кривой игрой и не знают как в нее играть.

Juego que puede parecer simple al principio, pero es muy completo en cuanto a mecánicas cuando lo juegas. Existen multitud de personajes cada cual con sus mecanicas propias (aunque la mayoría los tienes que comprar a parte). El juego te mantiene simpre en tensión, aunque no se puede denominar un juego de terror como tal. Es ciertas situaciones puede llegar a ser un poco injusto, pero siempre depende de tu habilidad en el juego superar estas situaciones.

Если бы эта игра была бы маком, то название было бы кемп и точка. В целом игра классная, если же ты играешь в фулл стаке, тогда есть какой-то импакт от тимплея, в противном случае, если ты играешь в соло, то тебя будут продавать, как турики рубашки на базаре и тыкать пальцем на твой шкаф, лишь бы спастись самому, но в итоге получится так, что вы отъедите всей командой:)

El juego es muy bueno, basto una partida para convencerme para comprarlo, me encanta, adictivo, excelentemente bien optimizado, no se mueve de los 62FPS, ni baja, ni sube, es genial, la jugabilidad con el teclado es excelente, muy comoda de verdad, graficamente esta bien, la diversidad de asesinos, lo adictivo y poder elegir entre ser sobreviviente o asesino es genial, la comunidad es muy buena tambien, muy poca gente toxica, (que si la hay, como en todas las comunidades), pero es una comunidad muy buena, recomiendo comprarlo en rebaja, por si quieres aprovechar a comprar algun DLC.
Sin embargo, no todo puede ser bueno, y lo que arruina este juego, es la gente campera, que te capturan y no se retiran de donde estas en el gancho, o no te dejan salvar a un compañero, eso mata al juego, no pasa siempre, pero si es algo seguido, eso le quita la perfeccion a este juego, una pena, por lo demas, encantado con este juego y aunque solo tenga 6 horas, siento que le dare mucho uso.

Good Game . But if then only with friends and a maximum of one random. Otherwise it's just hard to have fun. It takes a very long time until there is a lobby. Then it gets worse with the waiting, after a certain time. Conclusion: Fun game in itself with many cool survivor/killer models and licenses, would have really good potential to be a good cool game, would there not be this incredibly large toxic part of the community plus there would be a possibility to have a proper reporting system, where also somehow times a feedback would come.

игра очень хорошая со своими плюсами и минусами но я бы хотел сказать а минусах из за которых играть почти невозможно.
1 минус это кемперы. те кто не знает кто это я поясню. это маньяки которые охраняют свою жертву когда её повесили и не дают её снять. к сожалению разработчики похоже никак не хотят с этим бороться и просто на это плюнулию
2 минус это тоже маньяки только очень жёсткие. в самых маленьких рангах. Распределения похоже между нубами, про, и более менее понимающий игру нет. и это не только проблема у выживших ну и у маньяков. иногда играя за маньяка можно встретить выживших с топовыми навыками или играя командой то есть общаясь по дискорду или по скайпу и игра за маньяка бывает очень тяжёлой особенно если ты нуб и у тебя плохие навыки.
3 минус это читеры. Недавно мне как раз встретился такой.  Поставил я подношение которые телепортируют как можно дальше от маньяка, захожу,вижу генератор начинаю чинить слышу звук пилы думал что маньяк попался деревеньщина, через 2 секунды слышу биение сердца, он сразу находит меня и примерно за 2-3 секунды заводит пилу и режет меня потом вещает на крюк. и у меня вопрос. КАК ОН ПОНЯЛ ЧТО ЗАВОДЯТ САМЫЙ ДАЛЬНИЙ ГЕНЕРАТОР????? это ещё не всё. меня спасают с крюка снова где то слышу пилу думал он нашёл выжившего, и да он нашёл выжившего. МЕНЯ. я ведь спрятался но он снова каким то чудом меня нашёл. на этот раз он решил меня не вещать а распелить насмерть. и снова вопрос. КАК ОН ЗА 3 МИНУТЫ МАЧТА СМОГ УБИТЬ УЖЕ 1 ВЫЖИВШЕГО????? НАВЕРНОЕ ДАЖЕ ТОП МАНЬЯКИ НЕ СМОГУТ СДЕЛАТЬ ТАК КАК ОН!!!!!!!
если разработчики ничего не предпримут с этим в ближайшее время то игру лучше просто смыть в унитаз. но если всё таки не обращать внимание на это то игра правда хорошая. надеюсь что они это исправят вскоре и эти минусы учтут и уберут.покупать игру или нет решайте сами мне она понравилось но минусы игры всё портят

杨永信太好玩了
说实话，游戏是真心的好玩，但是对于五个小时的萌新的我来说，被屠夫追的日子真难受😭，所以我就寻思着玩屠夫，但是屠夫永远是别人家的屠夫，一到自己的手里屠夫就变了味道了，三四局屠夫吧一个人没杀，反而被当做猴子耍，后来嘛，果断玩人类，功夫不负有心人，终于逃出去一次！
Pretty good job so far (;
